title: Extra runes from before the rework
body: What can I do if I have more than 9 runes of the same type? Before you could use the combiner and hope for the best, but there's nothing now. Will Riot add an option to sell or do something with this? They just clutter the rune inventory.

replies.body: I'm not aware of any features coming up to remove or reroll older runes, but we can help with removing them.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can remove any extras.  We'll see you there!
